Package dbAPI

Interface ITable

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<IRow>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTable, CacheTable, OnlineTable, SinglePrimaryKeyCacheTable
public interface ITable
extends java.lang.Iterable<IRow>, java.lang.Cloneable
An interface that represents a table in a database
